Articles.Content:
Here is my Koncord and DC-10.

[http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=13021.0](http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=13021.0)

I also made a future Koncord that can go to india. (and still have 3 tanks left)

stats: 

![2nghfgy.png](http://i49.tinypic.com/2nghfgy.png)

how far i made:

![15p0uo1.png](http://i47.tinypic.com/15p0uo1.png)]

the plane:

(nose gear a bit bent by landing)

![20qezd4.png](http://i49.tinypic.com/20qezd4.png)

it goes 100 M/S slower than the koncord but has about 2.5x more range.

Hope you like it!

Koncorde?

India?

NOVA WILL HAVE YOUR HEAD FOR THIS!

> 
> Koncorde?
> 
> India?
> 
> NOVA WILL HAVE YOUR HEAD FOR THIS!

excuse me? ???
That\'s not india, that\'s Niveus Res Publica.

\*tntgodzz hides in bunker, awaiting nova\'s nuclear wrath upon the puny humans\*

btw, you went 442 km, concorde can do 3000 km. 2.5x range my a$$

We need better hardpoints. I lost so many aircraft before figuring out that the cause was my landing gear was floppy.

Note the forward gear on the image.

> 
> We need better hardpoints. I lost so many aircraft before figuring out that the cause was my landing gear was floppy.
> 
> Note the forward gear on the image.

I do have to agree

> 
> We need better hardpoints. I lost so many aircraft before figuring out that the cause was my landing gear was floppy.
> 
> Note the forward gear on the image.

I did say that...
Just strut gears to wings, works fine for me since my first plane crashed.

> 
> Just strut gears to wings, works fine for me since my first plane crashed.

LOL ive never crashed a plane yet
